Use of uninitialized value in concatenation (.) or string at /mnt/hadoop-mapreduce/src/docs/changes/changes2html.pl line 142, <> line 1519. Hadoop MapReduce Change Log

Hadoop MapReduce Change Log

Release 0.21.0 - 2010-08-13

  • INCOMPATIBLE CHANGES    (16)
    1. MAPREDUCE-516. Fix the starvation problem in the Capacity Scheduler when running High RAM Jobs.
      (Arun Murthy via yhemanth)
    2. MAPREDUCE-358. Change org.apache.hadoop.examples. AggregateWordCount and org.apache.hadoop.examples.AggregateWordHistogram to use new mapreduce api.
      (Amareshwari Sriramadasu via sharad)
    3. MAPREDUCE-245. Change Job and jobcontrol classes to use the List interface rather than ArrayList in APIs.
      (Tom White via cdouglas)
    4. MAPREDUCE-766. Enhanced list-blacklisted-trackers to display reasons for blacklisting a node.
      (Sreekanth Ramakrishnan via yhemanth)
    5. MAPREDUCE-817. Add a cache for retired jobs with minimal job info and provide a way to access history file url.
      (sharad)
    6. MAPREDUCE-711. Moved Distributed Cache from Common to Map/Reduce project.
      (Vinod Kumar Vavilapalli via yhemanth)
    7. MAPREDUCE-895. Per the contract elucidated in HADOOP-6201, throw FileNotFoundException from FileSystem::listStatus rather than returning null.
      (Jakob Homan via cdouglas)
    8. MAPREDUCE-479. Provide full task id to map output servlet rather than the reduce id, only.
      (Jiaqi Tan via cdouglas)
    9. MAPREDUCE-873. Simplify job recovery. Incomplete jobs are resubmitted on jobtracker restart. Removes a public constructor in JobInProgress.
      (sharad)
    10. HADOOP-6230. Moved process tree and memory calculator related classes from Common to Map/Reduce.
      (Vinod Kumar Vavilapalli via yhemanth)
    11. MAPREDUCE-157. Refactor job history APIs and change the history format to JSON.
      (Jothi Padmanabhan via sharad)
    12. MAPREDUCE-849. Rename configuration properties.
      (Amareshwari Sriramadasu via sharad)
    13. MAPREDUCE-1287. Only call the partitioner with more than one reducer.
      (cdouglas)
    14. MAPREDUCE-1385. Use the new UserGroupInformation from HADOOP-6299.
      (ddas via omalley)
    15. MAPREDUCE-1493. Authorization for job-history pages.
      (vinodkv)
    16. MAPREDUCE-1607. Task controller may not set permissions for a task cleanup attempt's log directory
      (Amareshwari Sriramadasu via vinodkv)
  • NEW FEATURES    (38)
    1. MAPREDUCE-1774. Large-scale Automated Framework
      (Sharad Agarwal, Sreekanth Ramakrishnan, Konstantin Boudnik, at all via cos)
    2. MAPREDUCE-706. Support for FIFO pools in the fair scheduler.
      (Matei Zaharia)
    3. MAPREDUCE-546. Provide sample fair scheduler config file in conf/ and use it by default if no other config file is specified.
      (Matei Zaharia)
    4. MAPREDUCE-551. Preemption support in the Fair Scheduler.
      (Matei Zaharia)
    5. MAPREDUCE-567. Add a new example MR that always fails.
      (Philip Zeyliger via tomwhite)
    6. MAPREDUCE-211. Provides ability to run a health check script on the tasktracker nodes and blacklist nodes if they are unhealthy.
      (Sreekanth Ramakrishnan via yhemanth)
    7. MAPREDUCE-637. Add an example, distbbp, which able to compute the n th bit of Pi for some large n.
      (szetszwo)
    8. MAPREDUCE-532. Provide a way to limit the number of used slots per queue in the capacity scheduler.
      (Rahul Kumar Singh via yhemanth)
    9. MAPREDUCE-467. Provide ability to collect statistics about total tasks and succeeded tasks in different time windows.
      (sharad)
    10. MAPREDUCE-740. Log a job-summary at the end of a job, while allowing it to be configured to use a custom appender if desired.
      (acmurthy)
    11. MAPREDUCE-814. Provide a way to configure completed job history files to be on HDFS.
      (sharad)
    12. MAPREDUCE-800. MRUnit should support the new API.
      (Aaron Kimball via tomwhite)
    13. MAPREDUCE-798. MRUnit should be able to test a succession of MapReduce passes.
      (Aaron Kimball via tomwhite)
    14. MAPREDUCE-768. Provide an option to dump jobtracker configuration in JSON format to standard output.
      (V.V.Chaitanya Krishna via yhemanth)
    15. MAPREDUCE-824. Add support for a hierarchy of queues in the capacity scheduler.
      (Rahul Kumar Singh via yhemanth)
    16. MAPREDUCE-751. Add Rumen, a tool for extracting statistics from job tracker logs and generating job traces for simulation and analysis.
      (Dick King via cdouglas)
    17. MAPREDUCE-830. Add support for splittable compression to TextInputFormats.
      (Abdul Qadeer via cdouglas)
    18. MAPREDUCE-861. Add support for hierarchical queues in the Map/Reduce framework.
      (Rahul Kumar Singh via yhemanth)
    19. MAPREDUCE-776. Add Gridmix, a benchmark processing Rumen traces to simulate a measured mix of jobs on a cluster.
      (cdouglas)
    20. MAPREDUCE-862. Enhance JobTracker UI to display hierarchical queues.
      (V.V.Chaitanya Krishna via yhemanth)
    21. MAPREDUCE-777. Brand new apis to track and query jobs as a replacement for JobClient.
      (Amareshwari Sriramadasu via acmurthy)
    22. MAPREDUCE-775. Add native and streaming support for Vertica as an input or output format taking advantage of parallel read and write properties of the DBMS.
      (Omer Trajman via ddas)
    23. MAPREDUCE-679. XML-based metrics as JSP servlet for JobTracker.
      (Aaron Kimball via tomwhite)
    24. MAPREDUCE-980. Modify JobHistory to use Avro for serialization.
      (cutting)
    25. MAPREDUCE-728. Add Mumak, a Hadoop map/reduce simulator.
      (Arun C Murthy, Tamas Sarlos, Anirban Dasgupta, Guanying Wang, and Hong Tang via cdouglas)
    26. MAPREDUCE-1383. Automates fetching of delegation tokens in File*Formats Distributed Cache and Distcp. Also, provides a config mapreduce.job.hdfs-servers that the jobs can populate with a comma separated list of namenodes. The job client automatically fetches delegation tokens from those namenodes.
      (Boris Shkolnik via ddas)
    27. MAPREDUCE-698. Per-pool task limits for the fair scheduler.
      (Kevin Peterson via matei)
    28. MAPREDUCE-1026. Does mutual authentication of the shuffle transfers using a shared JobTracker generated key.
      (Boris Shkolnik via ddas)
    29. MAPREDUCE-744. Introduces the notion of a public distributed cache.
      (Devaraj Das)
    30. MAPREDUCE-1338. Introduces the notion of token cache using which tokens and secrets can be sent by the Job client to the JobTracker.
      (Boris Shkolnik via ddas)
    31. HDFS-503. This patch implements an optional layer over HDFS that implements offline erasure-coding. It can be used to reduce the total storage requirements of HDFS.
      (dhruba)
    32. MAPREDUCE-1432. Adds hooks in the jobtracker and tasktracker for loading the tokens in the user's ugi. This is required for the copying of files from the hdfs.
      (ddas)
    33. MAPREDUCE-1335. Adds SASL Kerberos/Digest authentication in MapReduce.
      (Kan Zhang via ddas)
    34. MAPREDUCE-1464. Makes a compatible change in JobTokenIdentifier to account for HADOOP-6510.
      (Jitendra Nath Pandey via ddas)
    35. MAPREDUCE-1433. Add a delegation token for MapReduce.
      (omalley)
    36. MAPREDUCE-1307. Introduces the Job level ACLs feature.
      (Vinod Kumar Vavilapalli via ddas)
    37. MAPREDUCE-1430. JobTracker automatically renews delegation tokens for jobs.
      (Boris Shkolnik via ddas)
    38. MAPREDUCE-1455. Introduces job-level authorization for mapreduce servlets.
      (Ravi Gummadi via vinodkv)
  • IMPROVEMENTS    (161)
    1. MAPREDUCE-463. Makes job setup and cleanup tasks as optional.
      (Amareshwari Sriramadasu via sharad)
    2. MAPREDUCE-502. Allow jobtracker to be configured with zero completed jobs in memory.
      (Amar Kamat via sharad)
    3. MAPREDUCE-416. Moves the history file to a "done" folder whenever a job completes.
      (Amar Kamat via ddas)
    4. MAPREDUCE-646. Increase srcfilelist replication number in dictcp job.
      (Ravi Gummadi via szetszwo)
    5. HADOOP-6106. Updated hadoop-core and test jars from hudson trunk build #12.
      (Giridharan Kesavan)
    6. MAPREDUCE-642. A option to distcp that allows preserving the full source path of a file in the specified destination directory.
      (Rodrigo Schmidt via dhruba)
    7. MAPREDUCE-686. Move TestSpeculativeExecution.Fake* into a separate class so that it can be used by other tests.
      (Jothi Padmanabhan via sharad)
    8. MAPREDUCE-625. Modify TestTaskLimits to improve execution time.
      (Jothi Padmanabhan via sharad)
    9. MAPREDUCE-465. Deprecate o.a.h.mapred.lib.MultithreadedMapRunner and add test for o.a.h.mapreduce.lib.MultithreadedMapper.
      (Amareshwari Sriramadasu via sharad)
    10. MAPREDUCE-701. Improves the runtime of the TestRackAwareTaskPlacement by making it a unit test.
      (Jothi Padmanabhan via ddas)
    11. MAPREDUCE-371. Change KeyFieldBasedComparator and KeyFieldBasedPartitioner to use new api.
      (Amareshwari Sriramadasu via sharad)
    12. MAPREDUCE-623. Resolve javac warnings in mapreduce.
      (Jothi Padmanabhan via sharad)
    13. MAPREDUCE-655. Change KeyValueLineRecordReader and KeyValueTextInputFormat to use new mapreduce api.
      (Amareshwari Sriramadasu via sharad)
    14. MAPREDUCE-632. Merge TestCustomOutputCommitter with TestCommandLineJobSubmission.
      (Jothi Padmanabhan via sharad)
    15. MAPREDUCE-627. Improves execution time of TestTrackerBlacklistAcrossJobs.
      (Jothi Padmanabhan via ddas)
    16. MAPREDUCE-630. Improves execution time of TestKillCompletedJob.
      (Jothi Padmanabhan via ddas)
    17. MAPREDUCE-626. Improves the execution time of TestLostTracker.
      (Jothi Padmanabhan via ddas)
    18. MAPREDUCE-353. Makes the shuffle read and connection timeouts configurable.
      (Ravi Gummadi via ddas)
    19. MAPREDUCE-739. Allow relative paths to be created in archives.
      (Mahadev Konar via cdouglas)
    20. MAPREDUCE-772. Merge HADOOP-4010 changes to LineRecordReader into mapreduce package.
      (Abdul Qadeer via cdouglas)

      (Jothi Padmanabhan via cdouglas)

      (Jothi Padmanabhan via sharad)

      (gkesavan)

      (Todd Lipcon via szetszwo)

      (Amareshwari Sriramadasu via sharad)
    26. MAPREDUCE-373. Change org.apache.hadoop.mapred.lib.FieldSelectionMapReduce to use new api.
      (Amareshwari Sriramadasu via sharad)
    27. MAPREDUCE-628. Improves the execution time of TestJobInProgress.
      (Jothi Padmanabhan via ddas)

      (Jothi Padmanabhan via gkesavan)

      (Amareshwari Sriramadasu via ddas)
    33. MAPREDUCE-779. Added node health failure counts into JobTrackerStatistics.
      (Sreekanth Ramakrishnan via yhemanth)
    34. MAPREDUCE-842. Setup secure permissions for localized job files, intermediate outputs and log files on tasktrackers.
      (Vinod Kumar Vavilapalli via yhemanth)
    35. MAPREDUCE-478. Allow map and reduce jvm parameters, environment variables and ulimit to be set separately. Configuration changes: add mapred.map.child.java.opts add mapred.reduce.child.java.opts add mapred.map.child.env add mapred.reduce.child.ulimit add mapred.map.child.env add mapred.reduce.child.ulimit deprecated mapred.child.java.opts deprecated mapred.child.env deprecated mapred.child.ulimit
